import React from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour return (

${price}/per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* ============== booking form ============ */}
) } export default Booking
